All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents the admin account in the library.
Author
The author class represents an author of books.
Book
This class rappresent a book that can be loaned to a user.
BookCopy
This class represents the book that can be sold.
Category
This enum contains the categories of the books.
DuplicatePhoneNumberException
Exception thrown when attempting to add a phone number that already exists.
IllegalLengthForNumberException
Exception thrown when attempting to add a phone number that has a length different from 10.
Initialize
This class takes care of get the information in all the files that have information.
JsonReader
This class read json arrays and json object from a file.
JsonWriter
This class write json objects json arrays in file.
Library
Represents the library.
LibraryMember
Represents the Library member.
Loan
Represents a loan of the library, and it tracks isbn of the loaned book, the date when the book was loaned and the date when the user who loaned the book have to return it.
LoginManager
This class takes care of authenticate the user.
Main
 
RegistrationHandler
This class takes care of the registration of a new user.
Sell
Represents a sell of the library, and it tracks isbn of the sold book, the date when the book was sold and the price at the moment of the sell.
User
Represents the user account in the library.
Util
This class has all method that prepare the data to be displayed in the console.
